CustomField.description: Duration in milliseconds for tool execution processing. Used for ToolResult step types to track how long the tool/capability took to execute. This is different from LLMCalloutDurationMs__c, which measures LLM API callout time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tool execution duration in milliseconds. Only populated for ToolResult steps. Distinct from LLM callout duration.
CustomField.label: Processing Duration (ms)
